body: Kudos to the translator for this. Something I found funny is that the author focused on Takane's ass, which is a surprise because I remember that when Takane was introduced, the resulting joke among idolm@ster fans was that she dethroned Azusa as the girl with the largest breasts (Azusa's bust was 91cm and Takane's bust was around 95-ish). I'm guessing something changed in the interim or the author just really likes large posteriors and cannot proliferate.
Some of these lines got me laughing instead
